name: Bumble

topics.response_text: You're my hero, ma'am. I want to be just like you when I grow up.

topics.topic_text: I'm a Slaver. And I think you're just the kid I'm looking for!
topics.response_text: <giggles> You're silly!{begin with innocent giggle at what is obviously a joke}

topics.topic_text: Bumble, do you want to go outside?
topics.response_text: No, I don't like the outside!

topics.topic_text: Maybe you should wait before going on any adventures.
topics.response_text: Well, okay. But only 'cause Lucy says I shouldn't go outside alone yet.{A little petulant}

topics.topic_text: Come on, it'll be an adventure!
topics.response_text: Oh boy, an adventure! Let's go, let's go, oh pleeease, let's go now!

topics.topic_text: On second thought, maybe not. You could get into trouble.
What do you think of Joseph's classes?
topics.response_text: I learned how to tie my shoes, and how to put out a fire, and how to put bullets into a gun!{In the purest, sweetest, most innocent tones possible.}
I dunno. I still get lost sometimes. Things are really big.

topics.topic_text: Sometimes, people call me the Vault Dweller. It's nice to meet you.
topics.response_text: It's nice to meet you, too. Did you come from the vault? I heard there's monsters down there.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Vault 87?
topics.response_text: I don't know what that is, mister.{quiet, confused}

topics.topic_text: Why do they call you Bumble?

topics.response_text: No! I'm not supposed to go outside with strangers! Help!

conversation.response_text: I'm not supposed to talk to bad people.
Bye-bye, mister! I'm off on an adventure!{Totally naive. This is the last thing the player ever hears from her.}
Ha ha ha!{Innocent little laughter at a joke she finds funny, even if she doesn't really get it.}
I don't like the outside! I'm going home!{A little scared, a little defiant.}
Uncle Joseph, could you explain more about the outside?
Sorry, Miss Princess. Please don't get angry at me, okay?{scared and on the verge of crying}
Thank you, miss! We're going on an adventure!{Naive and unaware}
Oh boy! Let's go now! Can we please?{Naive and unaware}
Well... Okay. I can't wait to tell Lucy about this adventure!
I got a new tooth today! It was just lying there and now it's mine!{Excited and innocent}

description:
Bumble is a 8 year-old Hispanic Female.

Bumble is the youngest and most naive inhabitant of Little Lamplight, a small community of children living in an underground cavern. She is eager to prove herself as a 'big girl' and dreams of going on adventures beyond the safety of the caves. Despite her young age, she has learned basic survival skills from Joseph's classes, including how to tie her shoelaces, put out a fire, and load bullets into a gun. She can often be found clutching a worn teddy bear that has been passed down through generations.

Bumble's Personality: Eager, naive, and impressionable. Bumble is curious about the outside world but lacks the experience to understand its dangers. She looks up to the older children and adults in Little Lamplight, particularly Joseph, and tries to emulate their behaviors. Her innocence makes her vulnerable but also endearing to those around her.

Bumble's Backstory: Born in Little Lamplight to parents who were also raised in the community, Bumble has never known life outside the caverns. Her mother passed down the family teddy bear to her before disappearing under mysterious circumstances. Growing up surrounded by other children with no adult supervision, Bumble has had to learn quickly to navigate the social hierarchy of Little Lamplight while dreaming of the day she'll be old enough to leave.
